verses.verse: Finally <S%G3063><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, pray <S%G4336><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> may run <S%G5143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be glorified <S%G1392><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> also it is with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may be delivered <S%G4506><s%> from <S%G575><s%> unreasonable <S%G824><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> men <S%G444><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> have not <S%G3756><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> shall establish <S%G4741><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> guard you <S%G5209><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the evil one <S%G4190><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> we have confidence <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> touching <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G4160><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will do <S%G4160><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> we command <S%G3853><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> direct <S%G2720><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the patience <S%G5281><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> we command <S%G3853><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, that <S%G4724><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> withdraw yourselves <S%G4724><s%> from <S%G575><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> that walketh <S%G4043><s%> disorderly <S%G814><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they received <S%G3880><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> yourselves <S%G846><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> ye ought <S%G1163><s%> to imitate <S%G3401><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> we behaved <S%G812><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ourselves disorderly <S%G812><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>;

neither <S%G3761><s%> did we eat <S%G5315><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> for nought <S%G1432><s%> at any man <S%G5100><s%>'s hand <S%G235><s%>, but in <S%G1722><s%> labor <S%G2873><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> travail <S%G3449><s%>, working <S%G2038><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, that <S%G4314><s%> we might <S%G1912><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> burden <S%G1912><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of you <S%G3844><s%>:

not <S%G3756><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the right <S%G235><s%>, but to <S%G2443><s%> make <S%G1325><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> an ensample <S%G5179><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that ye should imitate us <S%G2248><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we were <S%G1510><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, this <S%G5124><s%> we commanded <S%G3853><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> work <S%G2038><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> let him eat <S%G2068><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we hear <S%G191><s%> of <S%G4043><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> that walk <S%G4043><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> disorderly <S%G814><s%>, that work <S%G2038><s%> not at all <S%G3367><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> are busybodies <S%G4020><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> them that are such <S%G5108><s%> we command <S%G3853><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> quietness <S%G2271><s%> they work <S%G2038><s%>, and eat <S%G2068><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, be <S%G1573><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> weary <S%G1573><s%> in well-doing <S%G2569><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> obeyeth <S%G5219><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> this epistle <S%G1992><s%>, note <S%G4593><s%> that man <S%G5126><s%>, that <S%G2532><s%> ye have <S%G4874><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> company with <S%G4874><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, to the end that <S%G2443><s%> he may be ashamed <S%G1788><s%>.
And yet <S%G2532><s%> count <S%G2233><s%> him not <S%G3361><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> an enemy <S%G2190><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> admonish <S%G3560><s%> him as <S%G5613><s%> a brother <S%G80><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> at all <S%G3956><s%> times <S%G3956><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ways <S%G5158><s%>. The Lord <S%G2962><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.

The salutation <S%G783><s%> of me Paul <S%G3972><s%> with mine own <S%G1699><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the token <S%G4592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> epistle <S%G1992><s%>: so <S%G3779><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%>.
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.
